invitation-code-help-title: How to get an invitation code?
invitation-code-help-rule-1: 1. If you are a Matataki user, please login to the website and check your messages. We have sent you an invitation code.
invitation-code-help-rule-2: If you are a new user, please request an invitation code from a user who is already registered (each new user will receive 3 invitations after building a site)
message-upload-images-size: Images must be less than {{ size }} MB!
confirm-logout: Are you sure you want to sign out of your account?
email-has-been-registered: This email has already been registered.
invitation-code-introduction: Use the invitation code to invite your friends to join the meta-universe! One invitation code can only be used for one ID.
login-with-wechat: Follow "Andromeda Andromeda" public number to log in.
message-click-default-node: Please select the plot next to a registered user
message-enter-valid-email: Please enter a valid email address
no-invitation-code: No invitation codes are currently available
occupied-modal-help-confirm: Are you sure you want to create a personal site on this plot?
occupied-modal-help-description-1: One ID can only occupy one space, and migration is not supported at this time.
occupied-modal-help-description-2: Please occupy the location you like and start creating!
occupied-modal-help-rules-1: 1. Meta Space is your own personal digital space, over which you have full control.
occupied-modal-help-rules-2: 2. The Meta Space you create will occupy one space in the Meta Network's hexagonal network.
occupy-close-prompt: Start creating your personal site on the Metaverse Network now!
occupy-open-prompt: First, please claim an empty plot
upload-images-format: You can only upload {{ type }} files!
message-invitation-code-used: Invalid Invitation. It looks like you've already used this invitation link
username-already-exists: The username you have chosen already exists
account-hosted-tips: Join the biggest public server and get the latest service for free
server-options-description: Through custom server options, you can specify and log in to other META NETWORK main servers. \nThis feature is not yet open to the outside world.
collection-success-tips: Has been saved locally, can be viewed in the sidebar
occupied-success-create-space-text: Congratulations you have occupied this Meta Space!
username-rules-reg: User name only allows lowercase, numbers, "-" and the length is {{ min }}-{{ max }} and must be between  {{ min }} and {{ max }}  characters.
fullLoading.closeTip: You can close this page if it is not responding.
